amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 118-76 to add the Department of Defense as one of the agencies to be included in the research on fentanyl as a schedule 1 drug and require the OIG of the DOJ to complete and submit a study on its findings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mills amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Mills.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mills amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
